mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID AS menuId, MENU_NAME AS menuName, CATEGORY AS category, SALES_STATUS AS salesStatus, MENU_IMG AS menuImg, MENU_PRICE AS menuPrice, HOT_AVAILABLE AS hotAvailable FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_ID ASC

SELECT MENU_ID AS menuId, MENU_NAME AS menuName, CATEGORY AS category, SALES_STATUS AS salesStatus, MENU_IMG AS menuImg, MENU_PRICE AS menuPrice, HOT_AVAILABLE AS hotAvailable FROM MENU WHERE CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY MENU_ID ASC

SELECT MENU_ID AS menuId, MENU_NAME AS menuName, CATEGORY AS category, SALES_STATUS AS salesStatus, MENU_IMG AS menuImg, MENU_PRICE AS menuPrice, HOT_AVAILABLE AS hotAvailable FROM MENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU (MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, CATEGORY, SALES_STATUS, MENU_IMG, MENU_PRICE, HOT_AVAILABLE) VALUES ( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{category}, #{salesStatus}, #{menuImg}, #{menuPrice}, #{hotAvailable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NAME = #{menuName}, CATEGORY = #{category}, SALES_STATUS = #{salesStatus}, MENU_IMG = #{menuImg}, MENU_PRICE = #{menuPrice}, HOT_AVAILABLE = #{hotAvailable} WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
